form.label: COVID-19 - States - Statistical Comparisons (US)
form.description: Custom Visualizations created by @FrontCentr showing coronavirus data from Johns Hopkins University CSSE (github.com/CSSEGISandData). US population data from census.gov.

search.query:
index="covid" host="covid-19-us" Country_Region="US" Province_State!="Recovered" Province_State!="*, *" Province_State!="*islands*" Province_State!="*princess*" Province_State!="Guam" Province_State!="*samoa*"
| rename Province_State AS State
`comment("get CSV name which is the date")` | eval day=substr(source, len(source)-13, 10)
| dedup State sortby -day `comment("keep only the most recent data")` | eval day_epoch=strptime(day,"%m-%d-%Y") | eval _time=day_epoch
| stats first(Confirmed) AS Confirmed latest(_time) AS date by State | sort $top$ "Confirmed" | convert timeformat="%F" ctime(date) | fields - $dates$

index="covid" host="covid-19-us" Country_Region="US" Province_State!="Recovered" Province_State!="*, *" Province_State!="*islands*" Province_State!="*princess*" Province_State!="Guam" Province_State!="*samoa*" `comment("| fields _time,Confirmed,Deaths,FIPS,Recovered,State,County,source,Last_Update")` | rename Province_State AS State
`comment("get CSV name which is the date")` | eval day=substr(source, len(source)-13, 10)
| dedup State sortby -day `comment("keep only the most recent data")` | eval day_epoch=strptime(day,"%m-%d-%Y") | eval _time=day_epoch
| stats first(Confirmed) AS Confirmed latest(_time) AS date by State | sort $top$ -"Confirmed" | convert timeformat="%F" ctime(date) | fields - $dates$

index="covid" host="covid-19-us" Country_Region="US" Province_State!="Recovered" Province_State!="*, *" Province_State!="*islands*" Province_State!="*princess*" Province_State!="Guam" Province_State!="*samoa*"
`comment("get CSV name which is the date")` | eval day=substr(source, len(source)-13, 10)
| dedup Province_State sortby -day `comment("keep only the most recent date for a given state")` | eval day_epoch=strptime(day,"%m-%d-%Y") | eval _time=day_epoch
| join Province_State [| inputlookup us-census-est2019-states.csv | fields state 2019 | rename state AS Province_State, 2019 AS population]
| rename Province_State AS State
| stats first(Confirmed) AS Confirmed latest(_time) AS date by State, population | eval "Incident Rate"=(Confirmed/population)*100 | sort $top$ "Incident Rate" | convert timeformat="%F" ctime(date) | fields - $dates$

index="covid" host="covid-19-us" Country_Region="US" Province_State!="Recovered" Province_State!="*, *" Province_State!="*islands*" Province_State!="*princess*" Province_State!="Guam"
`comment("get CSV name which is the date")` | eval day=substr(source, len(source)-13, 10)
| dedup Province_State sortby -day `comment("keep only the most recent date for a given state")` | eval day_epoch=strptime(day,"%m-%d-%Y") | eval _time=day_epoch
| join Province_State [| inputlookup us-census-est2019-states.csv | fields state 2019 | rename state AS Province_State, 2019 AS population]
| rename Province_State AS State
| stats first(Confirmed) AS Confirmed latest(_time) AS date by State, population | eval "Incident Rate"=(Confirmed/population)*100 | sort $top$ -"Incident Rate" | convert timeformat="%F" ctime(date) | fields - $dates$

index="covid" host="covid-19-us" Country_Region="US" Province_State!="Recovered" Province_State!="*, *" Province_State!="*islands*" Province_State!="*princess*" Province_State!="Guam" Province_State!="*samoa*"
| rename Province_State AS State
`comment("get CSV name which is the date")` | eval day=substr(source, len(source)-13, 10)
| dedup State sortby -day `comment("keep only the most recent date for a given state")` | eval day_epoch=strptime(day,"%m-%d-%Y") | eval _time=day_epoch
| stats first(Deaths) AS Deaths latest(_time) AS date by State | sort $top$ "Deaths" | convert timeformat="%F" ctime(date) | fields - $dates$

index="covid" host="covid-19-us" Country_Region="US" Province_State!="Recovered" Province_State!="*, *" Province_State!="*islands*" Province_State!="*princess*" Province_State!="Guam"
| rename Province_State AS State
`comment("get CSV name which is the date")` | eval day=substr(source, len(source)-13, 10)
| dedup State sortby -day `comment("keep only the most recent date for a given state")` | eval day_epoch=strptime(day,"%m-%d-%Y") | eval _time=day_epoch
| stats first(Deaths) AS Deaths latest(_time) AS date by State | sort $top$ -"Deaths" | convert timeformat="%F" ctime(date) | fields - $dates$

index="covid" host="covid-19-us" Country_Region="US" Province_State!="Recovered" Province_State!="*, *" Province_State!="*islands*" Province_State!="*princess*" Province_State!="Guam" Province_State!="*samoa*"
| rename Province_State AS State
`comment("get CSV name which is the date")` | eval day=substr(source, len(source)-13, 10)
| dedup State sortby -day `comment("keep only the most recent date for a given state")` | eval day_epoch=strptime(day,"%m-%d-%Y") | eval _time=day_epoch
| stats first(Deaths) AS Deaths first(Confirmed) AS Confirmed latest(_time) AS date by State | eval "Death Rate"=(Deaths/Confirmed)*100 | sort $top$ "Death Rate" | convert timeformat="%F" ctime(date) | fields - $dates$

index="covid" host="covid-19-us" Country_Region="US" Province_State!="Recovered" Province_State!="*, *" Province_State!="*islands*" Province_State!="*princess*" Province_State!="Guam"
| rename Province_State AS State

| stats first(Deaths) AS Deaths first(Confirmed) AS Confirmed latest(_time) AS date by State | eval "Death Rate"=(Deaths/Confirmed)*100 | sort $top$ -"Death Rate" | convert timeformat="%F" ctime(date) | fields - $dates$

index="covid" host="covid-19-us" Country_Region="US" Province_State!="Recovered" Province_State!="*, *" Province_State!="*islands*" Province_State!="*princess*" Province_State!="Guam" Province_State!="*samoa*"
| rename Province_State AS State
`comment("get CSV name which is the date")` | eval day=substr(source, len(source)-13, 10)
| dedup State sortby -day `comment("keep only the most recent data")` | eval day_epoch=strptime(day,"%m-%d-%Y") | eval _time=day_epoch
| stats first(People_Tested) AS People_Tested latest(_time) AS date by State | sort $top$ -"People_Tested" | convert timeformat="%F" ctime(date) | fields - $dates$

index="covid" host="covid-19-us" Country_Region="US" Province_State!="Recovered" Province_State!="*, *" Province_State!="*islands*" Province_State!="*princess*" Province_State!="Guam" Province_State!="*samoa*"

index="covid" host="covid-19-us" Country_Region="US" Province_State!="Recovered" Province_State!="*, *" Province_State!="*islands*" Province_State!="*princess*" Province_State!="Guam" Province_State!="*samoa*"
| rename Province_State AS State
`comment("get CSV name which is the date")` | eval day=substr(source, len(source)-13, 10)
| dedup State sortby -day `comment("keep only the most recent date for a given state")` | eval day_epoch=strptime(day,"%m-%d-%Y") | eval _time=day_epoch
| stats first(People_Tested) AS People_Tested first(Confirmed) AS Confirmed latest(_time) AS date by State | eval "Positivity Rate"=(Confirmed/People_Tested)*100 | sort $top$ "Positivity Rate" | convert timeformat="%F" ctime(date) | fields - $dates$
